channel.title: Astronomy fact of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the astronomy fact of the day.

item.title: Laurie Rousseau-Nepton
item.description: Laurie Rousseau-Nepton is a Canadian astronomer at the Dunlap Institute for Astronomy & Astrophysics at the University of Toronto, and was the first Indigenous woman in Canada to obtain a Ph.D. in astrophysics.
